creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
The Microsoft LDAP SDK returns LDAP_UNAVAILABLE in circumstances where other
SDKs would return LDAP_SERVER_DOWN.  

I'd like to be able to abstract this for applications via a macro in apr-util

See httpd PR: http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=39095

http://people.apache.org/~covener/apu-1.3.x-ldap_server_down.diff
